content: शिक्षा [शिक्ष्-भाबे अ] {@--1@} Learning, study, acquisition of knowledge; शिक्षाविशेषलघुहस्ततया निमेषात् <ls>R. 9. 63.</ls> {@--2@} Desire of being able to do anything, wish to prevail; <ls>Ki. 15. 37.</ls> {@--3@} Teaching, instruction, training; काव्यजशिक्षयाऽब्यासः <ls>K. P. 1</ls>; अभूच्च नम्रः प्रणिपातशिक्षया <ls>R. 3. 25</ls>; <ls>M. 4. 9.</ls> {@--4@} One of the six Vedāngas, the science which teaches the proper pronunciation of words and laws of euphony. {@--5@} Modesty, humility. {@--6@} Science; रणशिक्षा ‘military science'. {@--7@} Giving, bestowing (<ab>Ved.</ab>)
